trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACETRAINING_00227_TALK_ACTOR_02<tab>What sort of training did you have in mind for <var 29 EA02 /var>, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACETRAINING_00227_001_DONE<tab>As expected, your race chocobo responded wonderfully to the training! I trust you will be pleased with the results.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACETRAINING_00227_TALK_ACTOR<tab>What sort of training did you have in mind, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACETRAINING_00227_ERROR_001_01<tab>Wait─this conversation is rather premature, is it not? You do not even have a race chocobo registered!
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACETRAINING_00227_ERROR_001_02<tab>Race chocobos cannot be trained until they have been officially registered.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACETRAINING_00227_ERROR_002_01<tab>Hmmm, mayhap I spoke too soon. I fear your race chocobo would not benefit from further training at this time.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACETRAINING_00227_ERROR_002_02<tab>Additional training sessions will become available as your race chocobo increases in rank.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACETRAINING_00227_ERROR_003_01<tab>...Are we not forgetting something? A proper training session requires proper sustenance.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACETRAINING_00227_ERROR_003_02<tab>Training sessions cannot be conducted without the requisite feed, which can be purchased from the tack & feed trader at the race counter.

TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACETRAINING_00227_ERROR_004_01<tab>Forgive me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, but I must protest. In my expert opinion, your race chocobo will not benefit from such training.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACETRAINING_00227_ERROR_004_02<tab>Your race chocobo's <var 2F ((<var 28 ((RacingChocoboParam)) E80201 /var>)) /var> can no longer be increased.
